programme.desc: Noel Edmonds presents performances from Darts, Boney M, Wings, Brotherhood of Man, Father Abraham and The Smurfs, The Bee Gees, Brian and Michael, Kate Bush, Showaddywaddy, Abba, Rose Royce and John Travolta and Olivia Newton-John, plus Legs and Co.

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: Hyacinth decides that, because it is Christmas, Richard should distribute gifts to the old people at the Church Hall dressed as Santa Claus. When Richard gets incredibly drunk with Emmet, however, Elizabeth decides to take his place in the costume, with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Steptoe and Son
programme.sub-title: Seance in a Wet Rag and Bone Yard
programme.desc: Albert tries to get in touch with the `other side to try to contact his wife, and Harold of course thinks its all a con.

programme.title: Yes, Minister
programme.desc: The seasonal festivities at the Department of Administrative Affairs are overshadowed by rumours of a cabinet reshuffle.

programme.title: A Ghost Story for Christmas
programme.desc: In her final days, Edith Nesbit recounts the chilling tale of newlywed Victorians Jack and Laura. As they settle into a small cottage in a quiet village, they soon find their idyll overshadowed by the superstitious warnings of their housekeeper and the legend of two marble tomb effigies who are said to rise each year and walk. Jack dismisses this is as mere folklore. But as the fateful night draws near, he makes a terrifying discovery. And back at the cottage, Laura is all alone...

programme.title: A Ghost Story for Christmas
programme.desc: Its 1881, and Old College, Oxford plays host to three very different academics. Abercrombie Smith is a model of Victorian manhood, clean of limb and sound of mind.

programme.title: A Ghost Story for Christmas
programme.desc: Sweden, 1863. A country not much visited by Englishmen. An exception is the inquisitive Mr Wraxhall, whose innocent rummaging through the archives of the noble de la Gardie family takes a sinister turn.

programme.title: A Ghost Story for Christmas
programme.desc: 1923. In the heart of an old English college, Edward Williams receives an engraving of of an unknown country house with an imposing facade, a sweeping lawn - and, just perhaps, something else.

programme.title: Omnibus
programme.sub-title: Whistle and Ill Come to You
programme.desc: An ancient whistle dating back to the times of the Knights Templar spells danger for the man who finds it. Classic MR James chiller adapted by Jonathan Miller.

programme.title: Zog
programme.desc: A keen young dragon wants to learn how to fly, roar, and breathe fire in his first years at Dragon School. He is desperate to impress his teacher and win a golden star, but he is accident-prone and each year he has to be helped by a kind young girl.

programme.title: Zog and the Flying Doctors
programme.desc: Zog and Gadabout try to rescue Princess Pearl, who has been locked up in her fathers castle. Based on the book by Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: Christmas romances tend to be a bit hit-and-miss, with rose-tinted festive glasses making a Yuletide love story feel more than it is. Except of course if its between two porcupines - they always get straight to the point.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.sub-title: Celebrity Special with Jacqui and Sarah Greene
programme.desc: Broadcasting icon Sarah Greene teams up with Jacqui to explore a three-bedroom terrace in Northampton, where the work is already underway. We plunder the Hammer archives to show off one of Dions first auction lots, a converted 16th-century chapel. And fast forward to the present day, where Dions in Stoke to view a three-bedroom detached property undergoing a terrific transformation.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Join Natasha Raskin Sharp for todays show from Builth Wells in Powys, mid Wales. Experts Ben Cooper and Kate Bliss help two red and blue teams, who each have £300 each to spend on three items. Natasha pays a visit to the nearby town of Llanwrtyd Wells, where she has a go at the local sport of bog snorkelling. At the auction, theres great excitement, but which team will be victorious?

programme.title: The Highway Rat
programme.desc: A greedy rat tyrannises animals along the highway and steals their food at every opportunity. However, what the rat really wants are cakes and anything sugary, and its his sweet tooth that could finally lead him to a sticky outcome.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: Ben, Kate and the keepers are pulling out all the stops to deliver festive treats in time for the big day. The whole park is mobilised for one of the biggest animal enrichments on record. The keepers have arranged for tons of sand to be delivered to the safari drive-through for the zebras, giraffe and ostrich to play in. The keepers anticipate theyll love rolling in their treat, but as is so often the case with toys at Christmas, should they have kept the receipt?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A very special 20th birthday episode! Martin is joined by Changing Rooms legend Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen to look around a three-bedroom terrace just outside Bristol, and of course Laurence falls in love with the avocado bathroom suite! We delve into the archives going all the way back to 2005, where Martin saw a disused former public toilet that was up for sale at auction. Jacqui is in Essex to see a three-bed semi thats crumbling from the outside and letting the street down.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Charlie Ross presents todays show from an antiques and collectors fair in Shepton Mallet, Somerset. Helped by experts Kate Bliss and Colin Young, the teams hunt for bargains to sell at auction. Meanwhile, can anyone guess Charlies mystery item, which played a big part in local industry?

programme.desc: Colourful dramatisation of the birth, life and death of Jesus Christ. The film also depicts the tensions between Herods court and the Roman administration, the execution of John the Baptist at Salomes behest, and the story of Barabbas, told in counterpoint to that of Jesus.

programme.title: An Ideal Husband
programme.desc: Adaptation of Oscar Wildes comedy of manners about English society in the late 19th century. An MPs idyllic marriage is threatened by a blackmail plot, while his best friend - an extremely eligible bachelor - finds his independence threatened by the charms of the MPs sister.

programme.title: Wild Horses, the Rockies and Me

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A look back at the life of the actor Omar Sharif, who died in 2015 at the age of 83. Featuring interviews with the BBC and featuring contributions from the director David Lean, this episode explores Sharifs dramatic entrance into the film world.

programme.title: Doctor Zhivago
programme.desc: Epic adaptation of Boris Pasternaks Nobel Prize-winning novel about a Russian doctor and poet, set over three decades in the early part of the 20th century. Made an enemy of the state by the revolution because of his writing, Zhivago seeks solace with the woman brought into his life by the First World War.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An agent offers Joey a movie role as Al Pacinos naked body double, Ross tries to be less conservative, and Chandler thinks his fantasies have come true when he has an affair with a married woman.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A power cut leaves Chandler stranded in a bank with a gorgeous woman, Ross tries to ask Rachel out on a date, and Joey learns that Monica used to be infatuated with him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ick Factor
programme.desc: Monica discovers that shes developed a highly mature approach to her latest love affair, and Ross finds out that hes being mistaken for a male prostitute.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey gets a great acting opportunity on `Days of our Lives, Rachel dates a guy called Russ who is amazingly similar to Ross, and Monica renews her relationship with `Fun Bobby, but finds out Bobby is only fun when he is drinking.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After the Super Bowl
programme.desc: Joey starts dating a fan who is gorgeous, but soon discovers that shes also quite mad. Meanwhile, Ross is reminded how much he misses Marcel his old pet monkey, and travels to San Diego Zoo to find out what has happened to him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Prom Video
programme.desc: When Monicas parents clear out her old room to install a gym, they unearth an old video of her and Rachels first prom night. Its obvious from this that Ross is in love with Rachel and, having told him it will never happen, Rachel changes her mind. Elsewhere, Joey gives Chandler a hideous bracelet as a token of his friendship and is mortally offended to hear Chandler saying how terrible it is.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross and Rachel ... You Know
programme.desc: Among the guests at Monicas party is a handsome and sophisticated doctor, but the only problem is that hes old enough to be her father. Meanwhile, Joey buys a big screen TV and two reclining leather armchairs with the money from his `Days of Our Lives contract.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Chicken Pox
programme.desc: Phoebes submariner boyfriend visits New York on leave from the Navy. Unfortunately, Phoebe catches chicken pox at baby Bens first birthday party. Meanwhile, when Monica realises that Richard has no real neuroses, she worries that she is too strange for him.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Cant Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: Ross is suspicious about Rachels possible job offer from a good-looking stranger, while Chandler cant remember which of Joeys many attractive sisters he kissed at a party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross becomes increasingly jealous of Rachels sexy new colleague, Mark, and gets the wrong end of the stick when he spies on Rachel at her office. Meanwhile, Monica is enamoured with a sexy busboy who writes love poems for her, and Joey gets himself into trouble by faking his CV in order to get a part in a Broadway musical.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Monica and Richard Are Just Friends
programme.desc: Monica bumps into Richard in a video store and they decide to work on their friendship, but the more time they spend together, the more sexual their relationship becomes. Meanwhile, Phoebe dates an athlete who unintentionally keeps exposing himself by wearing loose shorts, and Rachel agrees to read `The Shining if Joey will read `Little Women.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner, Leslie, a failed television commercial jingle writer who wants to use Phoebes signature song `Smelly Cat in an advertisement for cat litter. Meanwhile, Ross becomes jealous when Rachel agrees to go to a fashion lecture with Mark, a former colleague who has just left for a new job, and Chandler meets a beautiful woman, Ginger, who has a prosthetic leg.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
programme.desc: Monicas first Thanksgiving dinner for the gang goes horribly wrong when they all get locked on the roof after watching a giant runaway balloon from the New York Thanksgiving parade. Elsewhere, Joey wins his first modelling gig as the poster boy for a venereal disease campaign, and Ross competes with his ex-wife to communicate with their unborn baby.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl From Poughkeepsie
programme.desc: Ross struggles to maintain a long-distance relationship, Chandlers well-intended attempts to get Rachel a date seem to miss the mark, and Monicas plan to assert some authority at her new restaurant goes awry.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: Michael is joined on stage by comedy heroes Harry Enfield and Catherine Tate, and theres a special duet from West End legend Michael Ball and opera star Alfie Boe. There is also unmissable new comedy material from Michael himself and Aled Jones hands over his phone in celebrity Send To All.

programme.title: Rosie Jones Out of Order
programme.desc: Host Rosie Jones brings festive chaos, as two teams led by Katherine Ryan and Judi Love judge members of the public, and each other! Guests incl. Josh Widdicombe and Jon Richardson.

programme.title: A Bad Moms Christmas
programme.desc: As if creating the perfect Christmas for their own families werent hard enough, three under-appreciated and overburdened mums will have to do it while hosting and entertaining their own respective mothers during the holidays.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: Bill Splitting Angst and a Gassy Girlfriend
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix are on a mission to call out the nations a******s. On offer this week is a dating disaster, and a sister who took sibling jealousy too far. (S1, E01)

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Joe Thomas, London Hughes and Harriet Kemsley

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin poses as a locksmith to expose racketeers terrorising the local business community.

programme.title: Police Squad!
programme.desc: Drebin goes undercover as a nightclub entertainer to expose a drugs ring.

programme.title: Kevin Bridges: The Story Continues
programme.desc: Kevin returns to the SECC to perform a record-breaking run of ten sold out nights to over 75,000 ecstatic fans. Recorded on a Saturday night in Glasgow, Kevin is in his element, as this home town gig shows off his no-nonsense approach to comedy.

programme.title: Comedy Central Presents
programme.desc: Comic Ardal OHanlon discusses various, topics including how he really feels about his native Ireland.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross learns that a pregnant Rachel wants to move out and find a place of her own, so he suggests a vacancy in his building. Then he learns that the elderly occupant is not quite dead yet. Meanwhile, Phoebe is ecstatic when Eric dumps her twin sister Ursula and chooses her instead, and Monica comes unhinged when she suspects that her new maid is stealing her jeans, among other things.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Feeling guilty for denying Chandler a bachelor party, Monica hires a stripper to perform for him, without learning that shes a prostitute. Elsewhere, Rachels father learns about her pregnancy and plans to give Ross a piece of his mind.

programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
programme.desc: A definitive one-stop shop for all things cruise, bringing you the hottest destinations and the latest deals to ensure that your next cruise ship holiday is your greatest one yet.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to a swimming pool but finds himself terrified of the high diving board; afterwards, he must try several imaginative ways to get out of the car park when he doesnt have enough money to pay. He then demonstrates the proper way to make a sandwich whilst out at the park. Finally, when Mr Bean and his girlfriend go on a date to watch a horror movie he teases her for being scared, until the film actually starts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a portable television but cant get it to work properly. Then, when his camera is stolen, he must identify the suspect in a police line up. Afterwards, he attends a magic show and disco with his girlfriend but ends up embarrassing her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Dirty Girl
programme.desc: Phoebe and Monica decide to go into business together after they cater a funeral where the widow tries not to pay, and Ross date with the beautiful Cheryl goes awry when he kills a rat in her filthy apartment.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes half-brother makes an astounding announcement and a thought-provoking request, while Joey finds himself in a class struggle.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Rugby
programme.desc: Ross takes up rugby to impress Emily, and Chandler sets up a ruse to avoid his former girlfriend Janice.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Worst Best Man Ever
programme.desc: Chandler and Joey vie for the position of best man for Ross wedding ceremony. Ross chooses Joey after Chandler inadvertently insults Ross, but Joey loses Ross treasured wedding ring. Elsewhere, Phoebe suffers extreme mood swings because of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel, Monica, Joey, Chandler and Ross go to London for the wedding where Joey meets Sarah Ferguson, the Duchess of York.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rosss Wedding - Part 2
programme.desc: Rachel frantically tries to get to London to tell Ross that she loves him before he marries Emily. Meanwhile, Rosss mother, Judy, and father, Jack, argue with Emilys parents, Steven and Andrea Waltham.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Ross Says Rachel
programme.desc: Ross has married Emily, but during the reception she punches him and flees. Meanwhile, new lovers Monica and Chandler are finding it hard to keep their agreement.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS
programme.desc: Joey challenges Phoebe to perform a completely selfless act, Monica gets upset when Chandler gloats about sex, and Ross has a chance to get back together with Emily - but first he must make a tough decision.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Thriller about a war hero who holds San Francisco to ransom, and the FBI scientist charged with stopping him. The deranged general and his men take the disused prison island of Alcatraz, threatening to unleash chemical warheads unless their demands are met.

programme.desc: Lenny Feder moves his family back to his hometown to be with his old friends and finds out that he didnt leave the crazy life behind in Los Angeles.

programme.desc: Joey challenges Phoebe to perform a completely selfless act, Monica gets upset when Chandler gloats about sex, and Ross has a chance to get back together with Emily - but first he must make a tough decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds out that her picture of her father, whom she has never known, is just a generic photograph that comes with the picture frame. Elsewhere, after Ross makes Monicas heater malfunction, her Christmas party guests swelter in the middle of winter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel wonders if shell ever get another job after she quits Central Perk, Joeys new job selling Christmas trees upsets Phoebe, and Ross accidentally breaks a little girls leg.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: With performances from soul sensation Seal and comedy virtuoso Bill Bailey, as well as new stand-up material from Michael himself. Plus Alesha Dixon will be handing over her phone in Celebrity Send To All and Father Christmas gets the surprise of his life before delivering a spine-tingling finale as the Unexpected Star.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: Thriller about a war hero who holds San Francisco to ransom, and the FBI scientist charged with stopping him. The deranged general and his men take the disused prison island of Alcatraz, threatening to unleash chemical warheads unless their demands are met.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder moves his family back to his hometown to be with his old friends and finds out that he didnt leave the crazy life behind in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: A Sassy Psychic and a Saucy Phobia
programme.desc: ...A******? Jimmy Carr, GK Barry and Jamali Maddix are sniffing out potential A******s. Theres a controversial psychic, someone who ended a friendship over ketchup, and some wild ex revenge. (S1, E02)

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: To make up for lost profits, Jared takes a huge gamble on bringing two valuable pieces of machinery back to life after decades of neglect. Handfallers Jim and Rob go toe-to-toe with a giant cedar that threatens to shut down the entire operation.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared moves into an abandoned logging camp, placing a $250,000 bet on a remote, dangerous site that will either sink or save his business. Ross is charged with moving the float camp ten miles deeper into the wilderness.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Jared Douglas and his logging crew risk life and limb to harvest some of the planets most remote and valuable trees. But getting these giants from the forest to market is deadly.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: In the logging world, big wood equals big money; its a tough job for the crews logging and transporting the biggest, most valuable timber on Earth.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People

programme.title: Gold Divers

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: Dave has a soft spot for all kids in need; so when a car show in Oregon that benefits the local childrens charity called, Dave eagerly said yes; the guys take the rig to the show; theres a rumour that Kev may actually get a spot in the drag races.

programme.title: Kindig Customs
programme.desc: One of KevDoggs favourite cars has arrived in the form of a stock post Bel Air, and he will lead the charge on the build; when Kevs pride and joy takes a turn for the worse, he enlists the help of a local dealer to help him get back on the road.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As canneries unexpectedly change delivery rules, captains must race to get to the front of the line. Jake risks a daring entry into St. Paul harbour, as Johnathan seeks help from Wild Bill.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: Captains scramble to meet an expanded quota in the path of a violent system dubbed Squall-pocalypse. A breakdown on the Wizard puts Monte in debt to the Time Bandit and Josh and Casey exceed their own quota when it comes to injuries on deck.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Freddy and Juan face off at a hard rock mine spanning three elevations at 4,000 feet in the Cascades; battling impenetrable rock, the guys devise an innovative 180-foot chute featuring a spiral concentrator in their first Washington state rescue.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With nearly forty years of mining under his belt, Freddy Dodge goes on the road to help struggling mine owners to hit the mother lode. He teams up with Juan Ibarra to overhaul washplants, introduce gold recovery techniques and transform operations.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: When Freddy and Juan get an SOS from an Oregon couples mine, they must unravel an underground mystery buried beneath a dried riverbed; facing misleading dredge tailings and a faulty homemade wash plant, the guys call in all-new tech as a final hope.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: With gold prices surging to new records, the modern-day rush is on; chasing gold fever, miners take big risks on poor ground with outdated equipment; gold recovery experts Freddy Dodge and Juan Ibarra are back, turning those pitfalls into profits.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Mine Rescue With Freddy and Juan
programme.desc: Two rookie miners in MT desperately need to double their gold after a disastrous start to the season.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: With pressure mounting after a disastrous first Forever Claim barge and the prospect of losing Float Camp, Jared brings in more crew -- including a gamble on a new Fat Truck driver -- to boost production.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: Josh Gates chases the lost fortune of Prohibitions infamous bootlegger Dutch Schultz. Josh dives the murky shore near Dutchs lavish New York mansion and searches the massive underground bunker that housed Dutchs secret distillery.

programme.title: Moonshiners
programme.desc: Tickle, Josh and the Laws build an assembly line of submarine stills for a large-scale run of pricey cherry shine. Mark and Digger take backwoods rye to a whole new level.

programme.desc: Jewellery expert Izzie Balmer and design whizz Mark Hill head to Wales for the start of a new trip. Mark makes the first move when he becomes bewitched by some magic tricks in Cardigan, while Izzie feels sweet about a Victorian cake stand.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth and his team are called out to peoples homes with a mission to sift through a lifetime of possessions and find forgotten treasures that can be sold at auction.

programme.title: Angus Ashworth: Yorkshire Heritage Hero
programme.desc: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshires big country houses in a bid to help save and protect these northern gems for the future.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell aim to reunite family members after years of separation.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: A woman separated from her mother because of a tragic twist of fate, and our first transgender searcher, desperate to know if their birth mother will accept them.

programme.title: Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Spine-chilling series in which paranormal investigators help families reclaim their homes from unwelcome spirits.

programme.title: Celebrity Help! My House Is Haunted
programme.desc: Gary Numan and his family moved into a 12-bedroom castle, only to encounter ghostly apparitions and a sinister presence targeting his daughter.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: Miracle on 4th Street: The concept of Miracle on 4th Street, asks a simple question. What would happen if Santa Claus strolled into New York in the lead-up to Christmas?

programme.title: Under Capricorn
programme.desc: Poison and passion in 18th-century Australia. A young man is shocked to find that his genteel cousin, married to a tough ex-con who has found wealth in the penal colony, has taken to the bottle. His efforts to restore her spirits turn into more tender affections, but the actions of a malevolent housekeeper spark a chain of events that climax with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: When Steve Coogan is commissioned by the food supplement of a Sunday newspaper to review half a dozen restaurants, he plans a trip around the north of England with his food loving American girlfriend. When his girlfriend decides to leave him and return to the States, Steve calls Rob Brydon, the only person he can think of who will be available to step in. Their first stop is the Inn at Whitewell in the Trough of Bowland.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon enjoy a taster menu at LEnclume in Cartmel.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob stay at Coleridges old home, Greta Hall, in Keswick. They visit Dove Cottage and lunch at Holbeck Ghyll.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: For their fourth meal together, Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon are at Hipping Hall.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit the world famous Malham limestone pavement, before eating at the Yorke Arms.

programme.title: The Trip
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Bolton Abbey and breakfast at The Angel at Hetton. On their way back home to London they stop off at Steves parents house.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob begin the trip in Piemonte at the Trattoria Della Posta before stopping at Byrons house in Genova on their way to the Cenobio dei Dogi in Camogli.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Rob and Steve go on a boat trip run by local resident Lucy, who takes them to a local restaurant. They visit Percy Shelleys house for a picture before continuing their journey that eventually leads them to another restaurant.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Viareggio in Tuscany where Shelleys body was washed ashore, and they have lunch at Trattoria Albana.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Rob and Steve arrive in Rome where they meet Steves assistant Emma and the photographer Yolanda. Together they visit the Keats museum, and have lunch at Ristorante Oliver Glowig.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob visit Pompeii and then have lunch at Relais Blu on the Sorrento coast overlooking the isle of Capri.

programme.title: The Trip to Italy
programme.desc: Steve and Rob are joined by Steves son Joe and his assistant Emma. They sail from Naples to Capri where they have lunch at Il Riccio.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Mozart is in conflict with his father, who disapproves of his sons marriage to the commoner Constanze. Meanwhile, Salieri is despairing over his own mediocrity.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: As Bertha, Marian and Aurora visit Dansville to hear Clara Barton speak, Marians interest in Mr Raikes grows.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: Heads Have Rolled for Less: As George fights to protect his public image, Agnes status quo is disrupted and Armstrong intensifies her campaign against Peggy.

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: A wide-eyed young scion of a conservative family embarks on a mission to infiltrate the wealthy neighbouring clan dominated by ruthless railroad tycoon George Russell, his rakish son, Larry, and his ambitious wife, Bertha.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: Gunner is a special forces soldier who returns to the field of battle to save his kidnapped niece in South America. He and his team soon discover that her disappearance is part of a corrupt private operation that hits way too close to home.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released aboard an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: Weather scientists Jo and Bill put marital problems aside to track a slew of devastating tornadoes raging through Oklahoma and stay one step ahead of their better-equipped but arrogant rivals. They have to get to the tornado first to be able to test a radical new device, by inserting it directly into the heart of the storm.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: Son of Memphis and Norma, little sweet penguin Mumble has a big problem: he cant sing a single note. In a world where everyone needs a heart song to attract a soul mate, Mumble feels he doesnt belong there. Our hero Mumble is the worst singer in the world, but he can tap dance brilliantly.

programme.title: Happy Feet Two
programme.desc: Mumbles son Erik hasnt yet found his talents, and he goes with his friends to Adelie-land which is ruled by a penguin who can fly. When Erik returns to Emperor-land and finds them trapped under big walls of ice. Will Erik be able to save his family and friends before it is too late?

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Swept into the sea during a family cruise, a young girl named Shenxiu stumbles upon a mysterious restaurant under the waves. There, she meets the scheming head chef and his ragtag crew of adorable otters and sarcastic walruses.

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: Stranded in the wilderness, a mule deer and a domesticated bear try to make their way back to the safety of a town preserve before a hunter catches them.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A crazy Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a race against time when three hung-over groomsmen awaken after a night of drunken debauchery to find that the groom has gone missing, and attempt to get him to the alter in time for his wedding.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and Doug take Alan on a road trip to help him through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In an update of the 1966 Lewis Gilbert version, the eponymous Alfie is transposed to Manhattan and working as a chauffeur. His conquests include older woman Liz, lonely Nikki and Lonette, his best friends girl. However, he begins to learn bitter truths about himself and the way he treats women and, by the end of the film, he discovers a degree of humility.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Black British Actors
programme.desc: For Black History Month, explore the film work of some exceptionally talented Black British actors, from Naomie Harris to Idris Elba and beyond.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Summer 1939. Influential families in Nazi Germany have sent their daughters to a finishing school in an English seaside town to learn the language and be ambassadors for a future looking National Socialist. A teacher there sees what is coming and is trying to raise the alarm. But the authorities believe he is the problem.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: With the German Army now just across the Channel, newly-appointed Prime Minister Winston Churchill must decide between negotiating a peace treaty with Hitler or standing firm. With the King, the public and his own political party all questioning his wisdom, the hard-drinking Churchill has to survive his own darkest hour and rally the country behind him.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Quartet
programme.desc: A long-smouldering flame is rekindled when a once-popular opera star reunites with her ex-husband and fellow performers at a retirement home for musicians.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Mouse Hunt
programme.desc: Slapstick tale which follows the misfortunes of two hard-up brothers whose plans to renovate and sell a valuable building are jeopardised by a rogue mouse. The brothers soon find themselves pulling out all the stops in order to evict their tiny resident.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: When Trojan prince Paris woos Helen, Queen of Sparta, away from her husband Menelaus, the legendary warrior Achilles is called to lead the armies of Greece against the city fortress of Troy.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: In search of a fresh start, two women embark on an impromptu road trip to Tallahassee, Fla. However, things quickly go awry when they cross paths with a group of inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: Thelma Post is a 93-year-old grandmother who loses $10,000 to a con artist on the phone. With help from a friend and his motorised scooter, she soon embarks on a treacherous journey across Los Angeles to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour whos eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a sex worker from Brooklyn, gets her chance at a Cinderella story when she meets and marries the son of an oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairytale is threatened as the parents set out for New York to get the marriage annulled.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: The Best Christmas Pageant Ever
programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Hallow Road
programme.desc: Two parents receive a distressing late-night call from their teenage daughter, who has just accidentally hit a pedestrian. They jump in their car, racing to get there before anyone else. Disturbing revelations threaten to tear the family apart.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to find the Entity, a rogue artificial intelligence that can destroy mankind.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Karate Kid: Legends
programme.desc: After moving to New York City, kung fu prodigy Li Fong enters a karate competition -- but his skills alone arent enough. With help from Mr. Han and Daniel LaRusso, he soon learns to merge two styles into one for the ultimate martial arts showdown.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owens view of reality begins to crack.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Three ghosts give a greedy network executive a long-overdue attitude adjustment over the Christmas period. Based on the Charles Dickens classic, `A Christmas Carol.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: The Grinch and his loyal dog, Max, live a solitary existence inside a cave on Mount Crumpet. His main source of aggravation comes during Christmastime when his neighbours in Whoville celebrate the holidays with a bang. When the Whos decide to make Christmas bigger and brighter, the disgruntled Grinch realises there is one way to gain peace and quiet. With help from Max, the green grump hatches a scheme to pose as Santa Claus, steal Christmas and silence the Whos holiday cheer once and for all.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E and an East European hitman.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A master of disguise falls in love with the brilliant scientist who developed a valuable formula he was hired to steal.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business, forcing his sons Michael and Sonny to lead the Corleones into a vendetta-filled war with other mob families.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: Stylish drama about a male prostitute in Beverly Hills who is set up as the scapegoat in a kinky sex murder. His only alibi is his lover, a prominent politicians wife. Will she help him at the risk of incurring the scandal that her involvement with a gigolo would inevitably cause her husband and herself?

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sants remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcocks day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.
