programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the case of David Marmolejo, who was convicted of the brutal murder of his own mother in 2009.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Richard Kuklinski saw crime as a way of life, and he soon progressed to murder, acquiring the nickname The Iceman for the actions he took when he committed one of at least five killings.

programme.title: The Murderer and Me
programme.desc: Dennehys ex-partner of 12 years provides details that shed new light on how a gifted student ended up becoming one of Britains most infamous women.

programme.title: The Murderer and Me
programme.desc: A deep dive investigation into the story of murderer Joanna Dennehy, unpacking the story of the Home Counties mother of two became one of Britains most notorious killers.

programme.title: Police 24/7
programme.desc: A combative driver provides officers with suspicious information and then attempts to flee; a neighbour tips off officers that a suspect just got home; a domestic violence call leads to an investigation where police must figure out who to charge.

programme.title: Police 24/7
programme.desc: Officers pullover a car containing a subject wanted for firearms and explosives; a traffic violation leads to an arrest of a man with contortionist skills; a wild hog making a mess gets the attention of the police.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Leslie Allen Williams: In May 1992, Leslie was arrested for assault. Once in custody, Williams confessed to the murders of four teenage girls.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching the Killer
programme.desc: Murder on the Drag: Margo Lafferty was brutally attacked and murdered in Glasgow in 199, a shocking crime that sent ripples of fear through the local community.

programme.title: Dahmer on Dahmer: A Serial Killer Speaks
programme.desc: 25 years ago, Jeffery Dahmer confessed to 17 gruesome murders that shook the nation to its core. Journalist Nancy Glass investigates one of historys most terrifying cases.

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: A picture-perfect Navy family is shattered when the father is found shot to death after returning home from deployment. Detectives are led to believe the crime is a tragic coincidence until a dark plan devised from lust and greed comes to light.

programme.title: Snapped
programme.desc: When a father in Spokane, Wash., is found shot to death in his vehicle, detectives work for years to unmask a vicious killer who isnt afraid to silence witnesses. They eventually uncover a long-kept family secret that breaks the case wide open.

programme.title: The United Way
programme.desc: The story of Manchester United Football Club, co-written and narrated by Eric Cantona and featuring insight from David Beckham, Peter Schmeichel, Teddy Sheringham and more.

programme.title: My Icon
programme.desc: Sports stars discuss the individuals that have inspired them.

programme.title: Laurel and Hardy: Their Lives And Magic
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes documentary shedding new light on the exciting and turbulent private lives of Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy and the genuine friendship between them.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look at the life of legendary two-time Academy-Award winner Robert De Niro, star of The Godfather Part II, Taxi Driver and Goodfellas.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: A look at the life of Academy Award-winning Maggie Smith. From `Harry Potter to `Downton Abbey, her huge portfolio makes her one of the UKs most recognisable actresses.

programme.title: I Am Alfred Hitchcock
programme.desc: Interviews and archival footage weave together to tell the story of the Master of Suspense, one of the most influential and studied filmmakers in the history of cinema.

programme.title: Searching for Sugar Man
programme.desc: Though he faded into obscurity in the US, an early 70s musician known as Rodriguez became a huge hit in South Africa and was widely rumoured to have died. Two obsessed fans set out to learn the mans true fate.

programme.title: The Salt Path Scandal
programme.desc: Follow journalist Chloe Hadjimatheou as a tip sparks a probing look into Raynor Winns beloved memoir, uncovering claims and evidence that challenge The Salt Paths truth.

programme.title: The Wimbledon Kidnapping
programme.desc: On 29th December, Muriel McKay disappeared from her suburban home in Wimbledon. Such was the strangeness of the case that everyone from the police, family, Fleet Street, and hundreds of clairvoyants all struggled to decipher the vanishing of the respectable 55-year-old housewife. Now, one of the men convicted for this extraordinary crime, and the families of both the kidnapped woman and the convicted murderers speak for the first time.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: A revealing and intimate look at the life and career of musical icon Tina Turner, charting her improbable rise to early fame, her personal and professional struggles throughout her life and her resurgence as a global phenomenon in the 1980s.

programme.title: I Am Patrick Swayze
programme.desc: Documenting the life and career of the prolific actor through family photos, home movies and untold stories. Includes interviews with the people who were closest to him.

programme.title: Bowie: The Man Who Changed the World
programme.desc: A look at David Bowies enormous influence on music, art and culture via interviews with some of the people who knew him best.

programme.title: God Bless Ozzy Osbourne
programme.desc: A portrait of rocker Ozzy Osbourne, including his time as lead singer of Black Sabbath, his solo career and his struggles with substance abuse.

programme.title: Terry Venables: A Man Can Dream
programme.desc: A look at the extraordinary life and times of Terry Venables, intertwined with the story of Englands unforgettable run at Euro 96, with insight from players, friends and family.

programme.title: Everton, Howards Way
programme.desc: The definitive story of Everton at the peak of their powers in the mid-1980s, when they became the best side in the land. They won the FA Cup, thrashed Man Utd 5-0, beat Liverpool home and away, and then strolled to the league title with a record amount of points. This is the tale of a man with Everton in his blood and a team intent on greatness, all told by the heroes who helped make it history.

programme.title: Val
programme.desc: A look at the daily life of actor Val Kilmer with never-before-seen images spanning forty years of his career.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: Acclaimed for her performance as Elizabeth II in The Queen, this is a glimpse into the world of the Academy Award-winning actress.

programme.title: I Am Paul Walker

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Recently separated, Brandi and Jarrod find themselves at the same auction, and tensions flare. So much so, that she gets the Laura treatment, and he regresses to his childhood self.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The King of Montebello cant wait to see what he can drum up this time around. Rene sniffs out a great locker, stepping over the competition to get it. Kenny does his best to fire up his profits.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Santa Ana, Dan and Laura hope for better units and better buyers. Rene tries to capitalise on warehouse sales and scoots away with a deal. Jarrod finally buys the locker he wants; Darrell reflects on what it means to buy lockers full of antiques.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Back in Montebello, Brandi and her buddy set the wayback machine and discover a roaring good time. Darrell makes the most of the little hes got. And Kenny fills his piggy bank, while courting an unfamiliar pastime.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy brings his son to Moreno Valley, where good things always happen, and leaves with yo-yos of an unexpected kind. Rene and Casey discover that their shoes are more "air" and less "Jordan."

programme.desc: A Christmas-hating businesswoman has earned her a fortune, but its made her a worse human being. The truth is that Carole is a monumentally mean person, positively Scrooge-like. And, just like Ebeneezer, needs a Christmas lesson.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Ronon is reunited with a group of his fellow Satedans and is forced to decide where his allegiance lies - with the people from his old civilisation or with Atlantis. His old allies harbour a dark secret so its vital that Ronon makes the right decision.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: An illness that diminishes intelligence awaits Stargate teams on a strange new world.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Torres associates are troubled by her increasingly reckless behaviour, such as orbital sky diving, and Lt Paris launches a new type of shuttle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: While exploring a rare nebula around a neutron star, the Enterprises safety is threatened by a little girls imaginary playmate.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: Bashirs holographic 1960s lounge singer gives Odo tips for wooing Kira.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: The team pivots when their sting operation to secure a massive bomb from an illegal broker leads them to discover that the device is already in the wrong hands; Jubals promise to be present at his sons birthday party is put to the test.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When an officer is shot dead at a pawn shop along with the stores owner, the team tries to figure out why a young, recent Ivy League dropout is tied to the crime.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: After Will Spanns wife suddenly vanishes at a gas station, his desperate search to find her leads him down a dark path that forces him to run from authorities and take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam
programme.desc: Counts down some of the most incredible, spectacular and hilarious real life crashes in the world. Video cameras capture massive pile ups, road rage and misguided overtaking manoeuvres.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Rapid Response
programme.desc: Following rapid response officers, the fastest cops in Britain, as they crack down on crime.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: A call-out to a stabbing proves far from what it seems. Officers are left baffled when a suspected drink driver passes the breathalyser test.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Reality series following the work of New Zealands customs agents.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Reality series following the work of New Zealands customs agents.

programme.title: Highway Cops
programme.desc: The guardians of NZs highways, they patrol our countrys busiest roads. From honeymooners to hooligans, either way the Highway Cops will set them straight.

programme.title: Highway Cops
programme.desc: The guardians of NZs highways, they patrol our countrys busiest roads. From honeymooners to hooligans, either way the Highway Cops will set them straight.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: A closer look at New Zealand cops as they deal with the challenges of monitoring the nations busiest motorway.

programme.title: Motorway Patrol

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: Air cargo officers discover a suitcase packed with surprises. Plus a traveller turns on the charm at Vancouver airport.

programme.title: Border Security: Canadas Front Line
programme.desc: An ex-criminal discovers that an honest approach is the best way forward, and agents discover the reasons behind a travellers lengthy trip overseas. An Alaskan couple wont compromise on their weapons.

programme.title: Nothing to Declare
programme.desc: Follow Australian Customs and Border Protection officers as they attempt to enforce the countrys various quarantine, customs, immigration and finance laws.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: More footage from Australia as we follow the men and women of the highways agencies as they patrol the countrys roads and freeways.

programme.title: Highway Patrol
programme.desc: A driver on the run from police crashes into a stop sign and risks a head-on collision with a bus. The question remains as to whether he will escape both the police and a serious smash.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: The 12 Days of Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Santa gives a successful businessman 12 chances to relive the same day so he can repair his damaged relationships with his loved ones.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis
programme.desc: Sheppard encounters a crystalline species similar to one that Jack ONeill encountered ten years ago, but this time around its different, the alien entity is evil and invading the teams nightmares in a bid to destroy the rest of the expedition.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1
programme.desc: SG-1 must confront a rogue Stargate commander who has taken control over an unfortunate planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: The Voyager crew discovers that an alien species has created a simulated Earth environment to train for an invasion.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The crew are divided when they rescue a critically injured Borg.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.desc: A prophet in the form of Kira and an Evil One in the form of Jake are forced to fight when the Reckoning begins.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: When a mob-connected police informant is found murdered, the Fugitive Task Force goes on a hunt for the killers; Hana grows closer to Ethan.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: When a group of Americans are among the victims of a bombing at a festival in Budapest, the team is brought in to find the perpetrators before they strike again; Vos new beau is injured in the blast.

programme.title: Blacklight

programme.title: Brit Cops: Rapid Response

programme.desc: n Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth, and raise their young.

programme.title: Africas Wild Year
programme.desc: Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africas Wild Year

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough explores the volcanic islands and biological wonderland of Galapagos in this three-part documentary. Here, he charts the archipelagos explosive rise from the ocean millions of years ago, and takes a look at its unique wildlife.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: David Attenborough stumbles upon species found nowhere else in the world that show how life has to quickly adapt to the islands ever-changing landscapes.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Galapagos
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the unusual species that inhabit the unique islands of Galapagos, including giant tortoise Lonesome George.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Exploring the shores of the Northern Territory and the abundant waters of the Great Barrier Reef. Facing flooded roads, hungry saltwater crocs, and killer jellyfish, Lizzie investigates why so many strange creatures make this remote area home.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Saying goodbye to the tropics and dipping into cool southern-coast waters. Coming face-to-face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish and huge blue whales, and playing with penguins and sea lions.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Completing the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Lizzie confront the challenges of survival in this region as she dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia
programme.desc: Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighbourhoods in nature.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia
programme.desc: The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich, two metres tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David descends beneath the waves at night in the state of the art Triton submersible, the first of its kind to visit the reef. He meets some of the tiny coral animals that built the reef and helped to turn it into an underwater wonderland.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David continues his exploration of the Great Barrier Reef, aboard the research vessel the Alucia. He discovers the incredible animals that visit the reef every year, from birds to whales, some travelling thousands of kilometres to get there.

programme.title: Great Barrier Reef with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David examines what the next few decades hold for this remarkable community of animals, as well as what is being done to save it.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef, the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. Its an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Christmas Island is a tiny refuge to plants and creatures found nowhere else in the world. Birds rule its skies and its stunning landscapes are the stage for a miracle migration of millions.

programme.title: Australias Hidden Islands
programme.desc: Fraser Island is the largest sand island on Earth. Somehow, on this nutrient poor bed of sand, life has thrived. Dingoes patrol its forests in search of wallabies while white-bellied sea eagles scour the beaches from above.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australias Ocean Wonder
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australias Ocean Wonder

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys across the globe to discover how the earliest animals developed on our planet. Attenborough meets expert fossil hunters, and sees on-site some of the most remarkable finds that have transformed our understanding of the first animal life forms, including the first set of eyes and teeth and the first predators and parasites.

programme.title: David Attenboroughs First Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenboroughs journey continues in Canadas Rocky Mountains, where fossils document an explosion in animal diversity never seen before or since. Travelling on to North Africa, the rainforests of Australia and the east coast of Scotland, Attenborough discovers how animals evolved to conquer not only the oceans but also the land and air.

programme.title: Micro Monsters With David Attenborough
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough reveals how different bugs usher in the next generation, including the butterfly and harvestman spider.

programme.title: My Wild Cats
programme.desc: In Africa, conservation projects have been supporting wild cat species across the continent through the creation of protected areas to give these majestic felines a fighting chance at survival.

programme.title: My Wild Cats
programme.desc: In Europe, follow the lives of Iberian lynxes saved from extinction, the journey of a domestic cat on the Canary Islands who transforms into something wilder during mating season, and some surviving European wildcats in France.

programme.title: Big Cats Small World
programme.desc: Exploring the lives of big cats, shining a light on the worlds of leopards, lions, and cheetahs.

programme.title: Big Cats Small World

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: Cinematographers Nathan Pilcher and Sam Davies have spent years filming lions in Zambias Luangwa Valley. This is their story, and an intimate portrait of three dynasties of lions.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: With their leader badly wounded, the Hollywood lionesses retreat and regroup. Meanwhile, the MK females use their feminine wiles to distract the nomadic band of bachelors.

programme.title: Big Cat Country

programme.title: Age of Big Cats
programme.desc: Saber-tooths rule the Pleistocene Era but the arrival of the new cats, early snow leopards, cheetahs and jaguars, mark a turning point in the evolutionary track.

programme.title: Classic Christmas Movies
programme.desc: The Muppet Christmas Carol: Film Critics Ian, Stephen Armstrong, Neil Norman and Christina Newland discuss the legendary Dickens story and the iconic charm of The Muppets.

programme.title: Christmas at the Movies
programme.desc: Christmas time just would not be Christmas without movies, and Tom Hanks and a cast of other familiar faces are here to reveal their favourite festive flicks and seasonal specials.

programme.title: Caught on Dashcam: Winter Specials
programme.desc: A seasonal look at the most astonishing, downright bizarre, and shocking footage of real-life car crashes as video cameras catch road rage incidents, dangerous manoeuvres, and huge pile-ups.

programme.title: My Friend Maisy
programme.desc: Maisy and her friends enjoy sledging in the snow.

programme.title: Morphs Epic Adventures
programme.desc: Five epic adventures starring Morph, Chas and the rest of the gang. Including Operation Sausage, Dolls House, Rainy Day, Cheesed Off and Game On!

programme.title: Arctic From Above
programme.desc: Join Liz Bonnin as she travels to one Earths last great wildernesses to reveal fresh insights about its animals.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: After Ever After
The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: On a Clear Day I Cant See My Sister
programme.desc: Lisa does what every little sister has dreamed of - she gets a restraining order put on her big brother. Bart is forced to live in the back garden, but soon realises the joy of communing with nature.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Decades into the future, Lisa recounts the story of how Homer ended up being scapegoated for a power outage that plunged Springfield into darkness days before Thanksgiving.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Coach Moe recruits the worlds greatest brawlers to teach Nelson the art of hockey goonery.

programme.title: The Nations Favourite Christmas Carols
programme.desc: The English National Operas Chorus and Orchestra make their way through Britains favourite Christmas carols, as voted by the public, with famous faces helping along the way.

programme.title: Harry Potter: A Whos Who Of The Wizarding World
programme.desc: From Voldemort to the boy wizard himself, Alex Zane sorts through the greatest witches, wizards, muggles and magical creatures in the Harry Potter movies.

programme.title: Roald And Beatrix The Tail Of The Curious Mouse
programme.desc: Heart-warming story about a six-year-old Roald Dahl, who goes on an epic adventure to meet his literary hero Beatrix Potter.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: The Unofficial Science Of Home Alone
programme.desc: Merry Christmas, ya filthy animals! James Acaster and Guz Khan see the science of Home Alones boobytraps, while Alex Brooker visits those who made the film.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Krusty and his daughter spend an eventful Christmas with the Simpsons. Reverend Lovejoy tries to add to his congregation.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: The Salt Path Scandal
programme.desc: Follow journalist Chloe Hadjimatheou as a tip sparks a probing look into Raynor Winns beloved memoir, uncovering claims and evidence that challenge The Salt Paths truth.

programme.title: Alan Carr: Regional Trinket
programme.desc: Alan Carr is back on the road with a stand-up tour as the funnyman finds happiness in the smallest things, from the high of his star-studded wedding to the low of living through a lockdown on a farm.

programme.title: Brassic
programme.desc: Vinnie and the gang have plans for a relaxing festive season, but they soon find themselves trying to save Christmas when they learn Dr Chris aunt needs help and the nativity at Tylers school is at risk of being ruined.

programme.title: Rob and Romesh Vs...
programme.desc: Rob has asked his Instagram followers what theyd like to see the duo do next, and so the boys find out whos The Greatest Showman when the double act join the circus.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: A Christmas feast awaits as Romesh, Jamie and Micah celebrate the season as only they can, with special guests over dinner and a spot of golf.

programme.title: The Killer You Know
programme.desc: Most homicides are committed by someone familiar, a spouse, a co-worker, or a jealous ex. Each gripping episode in this series examines three shocking stories.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A California police officer shot dead in his home. His ex-wife admits she pulled the trigger. Did a photo posted on social media lead to the officers death?

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Britney Gulley and Jeremisha Adams (both 19 at the time) are responsible for shootings and robberies that left two people dead and a third blind in both eyes.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: In 1986 the body of Patrice LaBlanc surfaces in a Texas Lake. Shes been stabbed 39 times by her drag queen boyfriend Cliff Youens. Now he confesses to his crimes.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Were Loyd and Agnes Courtney beaten and stabbed to death by their daughter Deborah? Prosecutors say it was for money, but Deborah says she didnt do it.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man confessed to the rape and murder of a woman at a pizza restaurant, police thought the case was closed. Until eight years later when another man confessed.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When two boys were attacked on a fishing trip, the police suspected locals thugs, but couldnt find enough evidence. Could the murky waters of the fishing hole provide proof?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A young prostitute is found dead in an Ohio waterway. Authorities face huge challenges to find the killer, with DNA evidence washed away and her policeman clients.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In a small South Carolina town in 1991, 17-year-old Crystal Faye Todd, a popular high school student, was raped, murdered and dumped in a deserted field. With few leads, authorities DNA tested several friends and the match was a shock to all.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman vanished from her home on Prince Edward Island. Her abandoned car was found in a field; inside, the windows were spattered with blood. During the search for her body, police found a plastic bag containing a sneakers and a leather jacket.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1984, hundreds of people in Oregon became ill with food poisoning. Detectives tracked down the outbreak to a cult which aimed to use germ warfare to take down the government.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In 2012, local DJ Ervin Holton is shot dead on his friends porch. With no witnesses, police turn to the security cameras opposite for evidence.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: When student Julissa Brisman is found shot and bound in a hotel room in Boston. Police use cameras to find her killer and are shocked by what they uncover.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In 2012, young Atlanta entrepreneur Terry Porter was found dead execution-style by his neighbour outside his home. With no forensic evidence or witnesses, detectives attempt to use surveillance footage to catch Porters killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: When Carl Starke is shot dead close to his home in Florida, police turn to CCTV footage to help hunt his killer, resulting in a huge manhunt and a shocking on-camera interview.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In San Antonio, Christopher Duncan leaves his apartment never to return home. Police have little to go on until surveillance footage offers up the possible identity of a dangerous killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In 2016, car salesman Hufracio Arteaga was found stabbed to death in his Michigan City office, and surveillance cameras from a nearby building could potentially help investigators reveal the killer.

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: In 2015 care worker Torrance Cheeves is found stabbed to death in his Texas home. With no suspects and a trail of puzzling evidence, will CCTV offer clues?

programme.title: Fraud Squad NHS
programme.desc: Join the UKs fraud specialists as they investigate a wealthy manager taking the NHS for a ride, a million pound tax fraudster claiming to be a spy, and an organised crime gang who prey on the innocent in order to launder their dirty cash.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Great Pyrenees Attacks Delivery Boy?!; The Judges Nail Appointment?!
programme.desc: A young man claims a large dog attacked him when he tried to deliver medicine, and Judge Judy realises that a case lacks crucial evidence.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman accuses her neighbours pit bull of attacking and killing her Yorkie. She brings the ashes of her dog to court.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Shameful Squatter and Pit Bull Pushover?!; Tree Trimming Travesty
programme.desc: A womans two dogs allegedly attack a landlord, and a tree-trimmer is accused of felling a tree and damaging his clients porch.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Emotional Vandal Pulls a Knife?!; Birthday Corvette and Abandoned Dogs?!; The Court Cant Help You!
programme.desc: A landlord claims one of his tenants attacked his home with a knife, a woman sues her ex-boyfriend for the theft of a Corvette, and the judge denies a womans repayment attempt from an ex-friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable Semi-Nude Photo Post?!; Quinceanera Loan or Friendly Contribution?; Law Student Should Know Better!
programme.desc: A man claims he sent a photo of his wife to his ex-girlfriend, A family friend pays for a girls birthday party, but expects to be paid back. And the judge reprimands a second-year law student.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Internet Obscenity Revenge?!; Wild Car Crash Caught on Tape!
programme.desc: A man claims he was provoked by his landlord to retaliate online after she slandered a Nigerian immigrant. A man speeds around a corner and slams into a utility pole, causing it to topple. He claims a stranger stole the car and wrecked it.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Child Abuse by Moms Boyfriend?!; Bail Out Gone Wrong
programme.desc: After a man notices bruises on his sons body, he files for a protective order and sues the mother of his child for legal fees. A man accuses a good friend of reneging on a promise to pay him back for a jail bailout.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Wedding Ring Theft?; Dont Kiss Your Sisters Boyfriend!
programme.desc: A teenager having trouble at home is accused of stealing his sister-in-laws wedding ring and pawning it. A woman is accused of bashing her sisters car with a rock after accusations of cheating surface.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A young couple with a child save $3,000 for their first apartment but claim it was dreadful. They are accused of smoking pot.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman claims she was fired from her job after a good friend accused her of asking for kickbacks from insurance referrals. A woman sues her ex-boyfriend for the return of a Pomeranian puppy he admits he took while she was in the shower.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Vicious Call to Ex-Lovers Boss?!; Roommate Roulette
programme.desc: A man suspended without pay after an ex-lover calls his boss sues for defamation of character. Cousins call it quits as roommates shortly after moving in together and fight over a security deposit, boyfriends and rent.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Last Will and Testament Surprise; Silent Partner Rip-Off?!
programme.desc: A man who took in his sick sister is surprised when she leaves her entire estate to a cousin, who accuses him of theft. A man admits he accepted $1,800 from his friend but refuses to pay her back, because their car-flipping venture went belly up.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: When Miniature Pinschers Attack!; If You Like Me ... Take Down Your Dating Profile!; Eviction Save!
programme.desc: A beloved pet is attacked by another dog while on a walk. A woman is sued for an unpaid loan to fly to Los Angeles to aid her actress daughter. A woman spends thousands to save her neighbour from being evicted only to learn she may not get paid back.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Quick! Take This Homeless Baby?!; Single Mother Mayhem!
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when a woman asks her mother to take care of her homeless friends child. Young, single mothers move out of their family homes and decide to live together only to fight over who gets the master bedroom.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Harlequin Great Dane Rescue?!; Whatever You Do ... Dont Answer the Phone!
programme.desc: A woman demands that her Great Dane be returned after a long absence and an unnecessary medical procedure. A woman makes a $5,000 mistake when she answers a random call from a telemarketer.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A 9-year-olds birthday party takes an unfortunate turn, ending in accusations of assault, bullying and feuding mothers.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Drugs, Kids and Feuding Parents; Childcare Drama; Drug Arrests and Friendship Tests
programme.desc: A father gets sued for claiming his children, who were taken by CPS, as dependents. A single mother gets a job but becomes accused of failing to pay for her childrens daycare. After an arrest, a womans friend bails her out but then demands payback.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teen Assaults Woman With Mace?; When Old Cats Attack
programme.desc: The judge accuses a mother of covering for her mace-wielding teenager who sprayed a woman in the face at a hair salon. A woman sues her neighbour for vet bills after a cat takes a swipe at her dog, causing injury.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Dont Sell Dogs to Teenagers!; Worlds Worst Roommate?!
programme.desc: A woman admits she made a mistake when she sold a German shepherd to an 18-year-old. When a man suffers a financial crisis, he spends his two roommates money instead of paying the rent with it as promised.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Sardines and Dr. Pepper Vandal!; Motorcycle T-Bone Crash!
programme.desc: After fighting over bad checks and missing money, ex-lovers escalate to car vandalism. An uninsured motorist becomes accused of hitting a motorcyclist at high speed, causing the rider to flip over the car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Unwed Teen Parent Turmoil and CPS Visits
programme.desc: An 18-year-old sues her childs father for the return of her belongings and for filing false CPS reports.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Mermaid Mural and Assault in the Yogurt Shop?!; Stylist Wars!
programme.desc: An artist claims a yogurt shop owner assaulted her and painted over a mural she spent over 200 hours on. A salon owner sues a former stylist for unpaid booth rent and lock change fees, and the stylist claims she falsely advertised everything.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A landscaper becomes accused of trying to scam an airplane owner out of his plane and faces a lawsuit for damages.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A father and daughter team up on a stepmother to sue for an unpaid loan and for a false restraining order.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Childcare Payback!; Expensive Phone -- Throwaway Boyfriend?!; Telephone Pole Crash!
programme.desc: A daycare provider sues a couple for unpaid childcare fees for their two children. A young woman sues her on-again, off-again boyfriend for a loan to buy a pricey phone. A woman sues her ex-roommate and his girlfriend after he crashes her car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teen Joyriders Busted by Police!; Uninsured Boyfriend Destroys Car?!
programme.desc: A woman fights to keep her sons police record clean so he can play sports, and she disputes $4000 in restitution with another mom. A woman sues her daughter for the cost of a tow bill after her unlicensed boyfriend totals the vehicle she sold her.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Home Profits Snafu!; Can You Find the Scam?
programme.desc: After making a down payment on a home in her cousins name, a woman expects to see her money returned when he sells it. The judge suspects government fraud after hearing a bad-check story about Social Security and a 17-year-old gambling problem.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.sub-title: The Earl and the Playboy Model
programme.desc: When Anthony Ashley-Cooper disappeared in 2005, his family feared that he had been kidnapped, but evidence confirmed that he had been murdered for his money.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: Alex and Maggie Murdaugh lived a lavish lifestyle, at their sprawling country estate in Moselle. In 2011, that dynasty would begin to crumble.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: A closer look at a murder in which the killer or victim lived a life of luxury and wealth. Each case is examined in detail as experts unpack how and why the murder happened.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.sub-title: Rags to Riches: The Missing Millionaire
programme.desc: A closer look at a murder in which the killer or victim lived a life of luxury and wealth. Each case is examined in detail as experts unpack how and why the murder happened.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: The Reclusive Millionaire: In this programme, each episode reveals a new murder in which the killer or victim lived a life of luxury and wealth. Each case is examined in detail as experts unpack ho...

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: The Billings were a wealthy couple. Byrd was an entrepreneur, while Melanie was a stay-at-home mum raising sixteen children. In 2009, intruders entered their home and shot both at close range.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: Mike Williams lived with his family near Lake Seminole, Florida. In December 2000, he went duck hunting on the lake and never returned.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: Voncile Smith and two sons were found murdered in Florida in 2015. The bodies, injuries, and a blue moon led investigators to explore a ritualistic murder theory.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: Samira was a fashion model in Paris when she met Adam Frasch. When she was found dead in her pool in Florida, police arrested her estranged husband.

programme.title: Millionaire Murders
programme.desc: Mike Williams lived with his family near Lake Seminole, Florida. In December 2000, he went duck hunting on the lake and never returned.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Simon Toyne travels to South London to unravel the unbelievable story of Banaz Mahmod, a woman murdered by members of her own family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: You Cant Take the Fireplace With You!; Best Friend Split After Party Swipe!
programme.desc: A woman wants her ex-fiance to pay for a credit card bill and the fireplace they once used in their shared home. After a mans car is sideswiped at a party, his best friend denies liability.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Pekingese Chihuahua Mating Mess; Camper vs. Computer
programme.desc: Neighbours disagree completely as to the terms of breeding and stud fees after their beloved pets hook up and start a family. A man being sued for a $3,200 computer claims his ex said that if he paid for half of a camper, the computer would be free.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: I Will Never Help Another Soul Again!; Load a Bowl of Cannabis Vendetta?!; Oops! Lost My Checkbook!
programme.desc: An ex-friend sues a woman for a loan and missing property. Medicinal pot smokers point the finger at each other when their growing venture falls apart. A man fails to repay his girlfriends aunt for a loan because, he says, he lost his check book.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Robbed by Lover While in Prison?!
programme.desc: An ex-convict claims that, while he served time, his girlfriend stole from his bank account. She says the money was spent on him.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Deliberate Finger Slam?!; Im Not Paying for a Dry Wig!
programme.desc: A man says his roommate broke the lock on his door four times, while she claims he assaulted her as she tried to climb in a window. A stylist demands payment for the wig she created, but her client claims it was over-processed and incomplete.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Husky Attacks Bichon Frise?!; Sick Girlfriend Payback!
programme.desc: When a dog sitter makes an ill-fated decision to visit a locale with a dangerous, large dog, a bruised spine and more than $7000 in vet bills soon follow. A divorced mother of three takes in her female lover only to sue her for rent.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: You Get What You Paint For!; Dont Fence Me In!
programme.desc: After getting a deal on a paint job, a woman sues the contractor for shoddy work, mental anguish and legal fees. A 12-year feud between neighbours intensifies when a woman refuses to spend thousands of dollars to repair a shared fences foundation.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Childcare Payback!; Expensive Phone -- Throwaway Boyfriend?!; Telephone Pole Crash!
programme.desc: A daycare provider sues a couple for unpaid childcare fees for their two children. A young woman sues her on-again, off-again boyfriend for a loan to buy a pricey phone. A woman sues her ex-roommate and his girlfriend after he crashes her car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Land Thief?!; Blown Stop Sign Slam?!; Fender Bender Battle!
programme.desc: A man claims a seller profited from his hard labour, then sold the property for a big sum of money. A teen motorist is adamant that a fellow driver ran through a traffic light, then slammed into him.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Attack Victim Cradles Pit Bull Like a Baby?!; Two Lemon Cars Equals Lemonade?
programme.desc: A man claims he was bleeding profusely after an attack by a pit bull whose owner says it would never hurt anyone. A young womans plan to combine two broken-down cars into one working vehicle fails miserably.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Bullhorn Craziness Caught on Tape?!; Sublet Sorrow
programme.desc: An elderly woman publicly berates her longtime rival throughout their neighbourhood, then he sues her for harassment. A woman sues a man for unpaid rent because, she says, he reneged on his agreement to let her out of the lease early.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A woman claims her friend lost one of her dogs and that another pet died on her couch while she was away on vacation. A woman and her roommate are surprised to find that their apartment is not owned by their landlord when police escort them out.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: Custody exchange drama escalates when a woman confronts her estranged husband about scratches on their child.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Spiteful Grandpa?; Timber! Healthy Tree Takedown!
programme.desc: A woman accuses her fiances father of suing her out of spite because he doesnt get to see his granddaughter as much as hed like to. The judge reminds a property owner that hes lucky that his amateur handyman efforts didnt kill someone.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Street Cat Fight in Front of Children?!; Young Waitress Dupes Older Man?
programme.desc: A mother of two suffers a broken nose at the hands of her sister-in-law during a heated fight. A 59-year-old man demands payback from his favourite server at a restaurant.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Slashed Tires and Stolen iPhone?; Moving Violation Bonanza!
programme.desc: A restraining order, slashed tires and accusations of theft come into play when ex-friends call it quits. A woman racks up 16 tickets on her friends car then has it impounded while she is renting it, and he sues for payback.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A motorist is accused of tracking down a biker who allegedly annoyed him and tackling him into a moving car.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Groom Gets Cold Feet on Wedding Day!; Landlord Game Changer
programme.desc: A man abandons his fiancee and is accused of stealing property. A landlady refuses to return a security deposit, saying her tenant was working out of his house.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Injured Cyclist Screaming Like a Lunatic?!
programme.desc: A self-described eyewitness to a violent road-rage incident claims a cyclist was screaming obscenities at a motorist.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Teens Crash Cover-Up Story?!; Baby Daddy Called Home From Callie!
programme.desc: A teen accused of drinking, driving and fleeing the scene of an accident insists his car was stolen. A young man says the money his babys mother gave him was to help him move back to Nebraska.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Drunk Man Rages Against Neighbor?!; Illegal Breeding?!
programme.desc: An altercation on St. Patricks Day leads to a man spitting on a womans car window, and Judge Judy tracks down his accomplices. An animal control officer sues a woman for breaching their contract regarding the breeding of a standard poodle.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Make a Teenager Watch This Case!; Shot in the Arm While Driving!
programme.desc: The judge dispenses wise advice to a teen who is hanging out with the wrong crowd. A man sues a motorist for crashing into his parked truck after he was shot.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: Police divers training in Loch Lomond, Scotland, discover human body parts. Detectives face a battle to put the killer behind bars as the prime suspect flees.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: A murdered US woman is found in a duffle-bag washed up on the Florida coast. Her married, military lover is the prime suspect, and a single gold earring seals his fate.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: A body is found floating at a dock in a North Florida creek. US Police initially suspect a motive of robbery, but the victims complex love life suggests otherwise.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: A drought at a French lake reveals a sunken Toyota holding the body of a UK expat whos been missing for two years. Her controlling husband becomes polices prime suspect.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: A US woman allegedly drowns in the bathtub, but her husbands story doesnt add up. When his second wife also drowns two years on, polices worst fears are confirmed.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: In the US, a missing womans body is found washed up on the shore of a tidal estuary. CCTV, DNA and a cryptic note lead investigators to her ex-partner.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: When a UK fisherman is murdered and dumped in the River Thames, forensics link three men to the scene. But evidence lost in the river makes convicting his killers challenging.

programme.title: Body In The Water
programme.desc: A womans husband reports her falling overboard into Lake Erie, US, but police suspect foul play. When her body surfaces three weeks on, its clear this was no boating accident.

programme.desc: Nessa and the Wests head east, with some help from Dave and his coach. programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team pays a visit to Lord Byrons former home, Newstead Abbey in Nottinghamshire. Fiona Bruce and the experts welcome two thousand visitors bringing their family treasures. programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A near-perfect 50s Chevy panel van and a very desirable low-mileage 80s Brooklands Capri tempt auctioneer Derek out of Yorkshire.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: The team struggles to explain how a DAF 33 gearbox works, and office manager Sarah attempts to bring order to the auto memorabilia sale.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Series celebrating our planet in all its glory. This episode journeys across the world, following the influence of the sun and discovering how its seasonal journey affects the lives of all who live on earth. As spring arrives in the Arctic, a mother polar bear emerges from her den with two tiny cubs. At the other end of the planet, winter arrives and Emperor penguins are plunged into darkness for four months.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Taking an epic journey following the descent of the planets mightiest rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. programme.title: Allo Allo!
programme.desc: Rene is managing to keep the Germans out of his hair, until the Resistance commandeer his cafe to hide two British airmen and the Gestapo arrive on the trail of looted art.

programme.title: Allo Allo!

programme.title: World at War
